=A/B Test Framework API 文档=

# [[api_doc/domains|域模型 ]]
==`RuleType`查询添加==
# [[api_doc/rule-types_get|/ab/rule-types GET]] 列出所有的`RupeType`
# [[api_doc/rule-types_id_get|/ab/rule-types/{code} GET]] 获取指定的 `RupeType`
==添加管理`Experiment`==
# [[api_doc/experiments_post|/ab/experiments POST]] 新建一个 `Experiment`
# [[api_doc/experiments_get|/ab/experiments GET]] 获得 `Experiment` 列表
# [[api_doc/experiments_id_get|/ab/experiments/{code} GET]] 获取指定的 `Experiment`
# [[api_doc/experiments_id_put|/ab/experiments/{code} PUT]] 刷新整个`Experiment`
